headline: Shuffle Board: Dollar Tree, StockX See CEOs Exit
summary: Dollar Tree’s Rick Dreiling steps down as chief executive officer while StockX co-founder Greg Schwartz will replace Scott Cutler as CEO.

headline: Is Dollar Tree, Inc. (DLTR) a Good Grocery Stock to Invest In Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Grocery Stocks To Invest In Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ:DLTR) stands against the other grocery stocks. Food prices, along with energy prices, tend to be historically volatile, which is why they are excluded from the […]
